info.comment: You are locked in a bathroom. You must look around to find 4 sphere's to unlock the door. There is a bomb in the bathroom so you have 3 minutes to find the sphere's before it explodes. Since you are also unexperienced in bomb defusing, that is your only option. Please comment, rate and tell me if you win! Also, I will only be making a sequel if I get 150 love it's. This is because making the game was really annoying and took me ages! I've been working on it for at least a month so if I know people don't like it then I won't bother making a sequel.
info.author: 05jhill
